content: PM 30-MG Multi-line laser Multi-line laser with 3 green 360° lines for plumbing, leveling, aligning and squaring ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Laser layout tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compact ergonomic design - our most compact tool for precise and fast 360° aligning, leveling, and squaring High accuracy – self-leveling and fine adjustment knob for accurate alignment and faster set up Durable battery life - rechargeable B12 Li-ion battery for up to 1.5 days of continuous layout work Increased productivity - out-of-level and low battery alerts to help reduce mistakes and unexpected downtime Laser class 2 – no special precautionary measures needed Applications Setting out drywall tracks on floors, walls, ceiling Suspended ceiling alignment Transfering reference heights Vertical alignment of pipes and cables Leveling electric sockets, cable trays, radiators and pipe installations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accuracy: ±0.12 in at 33 ft Max. operating distance (diameter): 131 ft (lines), 328 ft (lines, with receiver) Self leveling range at room temperature: -4.0/ +4.0° ° Technical Data | Accuracy | ±0.12 in at 33 ft | Max. operating distance (diameter) | 131 ft (lines), 328 ft (lines, with receiver) | 1 | Self leveling range at room temperature | -4.0/ +4.0° ° | Self leveling time | 3 s | Horizontal fan angle | 360 ° | Vertical fan angle | 360 ° | IP protection class | IP 54 (EN 60529) | Laser type | Line | Operating distance can be significantly affected by site conditions. See operating instructions. ### ITEMS- 3697450 - Buy 10 get 3 PM 30 MG Installer Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 13x PM 30-MG Multi line laser - 13x PMA 90 Wall mount with magnetic bracket - 13x PMA 92 Strap - 13x PM 30-MG Tool case assy - 3697451 - Buy 4 get 1 PM 30 MG Installer Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5x PM 30-MG Multi line laser - 5x PMA 90 Wall mount with magnetic bracket - 5x PMA 92 Strap - 5x PM 30-MG Tool case assy - 3622328 - PM 30-MG buy4 get1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5x PM 30-MG Multi line laser - 5x PMA 90 Wall mount with magnetic bracket - 5x PMA 92 Strap - 5x PM 30-MG Tool case assy - 5x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 5x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 5x PRA 54 (CM/IN) Target plate - 3622327 - PM 30-MG + receiver - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 30-MG Multi line laser - 1x PMA 90 Wall mount with magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 92 Strap - 1x PM 30-MG Tool case assy - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x PMA 32 Receiver - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x PRA 54 (CM/IN) Target plate - 3622326 - PM 30-MG basic kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 30-MG Multi line laser - 1x PMA 90 Wall mount with magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 92 Strap - 1x PM 30-MG Tool case assy - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x PRA 54 (CM/IN) Target plate - 2227742 - Multi line laser PM 30-MG - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 30-MG Multi line laser - 1x PMA 90 Wall mount with magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 92 Strap - 1x PM 30-MG Tool case assy
